## utils namespace

## Functions

|  Function | Description |
|  --- | --- |
|  [getServices(options)](./dids.utils.getservices.md) | <p>Retrieves services from a given DID document based on provided options. If no <code>id</code> or <code>type</code> filters are provided, all defined services are returned.</p><p>Note: The DID document must adhere to the W3C DID specification.</p> |
|  [getVerificationMethodIds(options)](./dids.utils.getverificationmethodids.md) |  |
|  [getVerificationMethodTypes(options)](./dids.utils.getverificationmethodtypes.md) | <p>Retrieves DID verification method types from a given DID document.</p><p>Note: The DID document must adhere to the W3C DID specification.</p> |
|  [isDwnServiceEndpoint(endpoint)](./dids.utils.isdwnserviceendpoint.md) | Type guard function to check if the given endpoint is a DwnServiceEndpoint. |
